name: PeakCash[Colombia]
description:
This is a video game where you can mine the surrounding rocks in search of golden coins, which are very scarce. but you have limited time to find them, and limited energy. however, you will be able to find more time and energy by mining the stones. You can play it from your computer or from your mobile. just press the direction where you want to mine.

Download external

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1qvE5nHKe044sBb3jvnZG5k1pnczL2NpC?usp=sha...
